* This class provides access to Jeda and system properties.
 *
 * @since 2.6

* Returns the value associated with the specified key as boolean. Returns
defaultValue if * the specified key is not present or is null or if the value associated with the key cannot be * converted to a boolean. Valid boolean values are (case insensitive): *
    *
  • For true: "1", "on", "true", "yes", *
  • For false: "0", "off", "false", "no", *
* * @param key the key of the required value * @param defaultValue the value to return when the key is not present * @return the value associated with the key as boolean * * @since 2.6

* Returns the value associated with the specified key as int. Returns
defaultValue if the * specified key is not present or is null or if the value associated with the key cannot be converted * to an int. * * @param key the key of the required value * @param defaultValue the value to return when the key is not present * @return the value associated with the key as double * * @since 2.6

* Returns the value associated with the specified key as String. Returns defaultValue if * the specified key is not present or is null. * * @param key the key of the required value * @param defaultValue the value to return when the key is not present * @return the value associated with the key as String * * @since 2.6
